description: This Python source file defines functions related to extracting and formatting version information from a given info dictionary. It contains utility functions GetVersion and GetVersionString used for processing version data.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a version list [major, minor, patch] from the info dictionary, handling different formats and defaults.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Generates a dot-separated version string from the info dictionary by utilizing GetVersion.
